text: James McMillan "Jim" Nielson Graham (August 26, 1945 â€“ June 11, 2017) was a Scottish-born American politician. He served as a member of the Council of the District of Columbia. He was a Democrat. He represented Ward 1 in Washington, D.C. from 1999 through 2015. He was born in Wishaw, Scotland. Graham died on June 11, 2017 at a hospital in Washington, D.C. from complications of a lung infection caused by chronic obstructive pulmonary disease, aged 71. ==References== ==Other websites== *Jim Graham's Official Homepage *Metro - About Metro - Biographies WMATA biography *Guide to the Jim Graham Papers, 1973-2006, Special Collections Research Center, Estelle and Melvin Gelman Library, The George Washington University Category:1945 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:Politicians from Washington, D.C. title: Jim Graham
